drama.title: Dramatised Tour
drama.detail: Tour with Thomas, one of Henry's courtiers, who can tell you about life at the palaces.

expert.title: Expert Led Tour
expert.detail: Tour the palace with our resident experts and historians.

family.title: Family Tour
family.detail: Easy and fun tour for children aged 12 & under.

guide.title:
How to use
this visitor guide
guide.instructions:
Swipe to begin and
move through this tutorial
guide.volume_instr:
Use these buttons to control how
high or low you would like the
volume to be.
guide.menu_instr:
Use the menu icon in the right
hand corner to explore
different features.
guide.map_instr:
Use the palace map in the right hand
corner to explore the different
routes, shops and cafes.

cards.swipe_back: Swipe down to bring the cards back

end_of_tour.completed_text: You have reached the end of

feedback.title: Rate your experience with the digital visitor guide

feedbackQuestions.question: How would you rate your experience of using this digital visitor guide today?
How would you rate the ease of navigating your way around the palace using this guide?

settings.title: Settings
settings.userGuideHeading: How to use this visitor guide

helpScreen.helpScreenTitle: How to use this app (Dev Test)

welcome.guidedTour: Start a guided tour from Base Court

exploreView.listMessage: Scroll through the list of places of interest and select a route to explore the palace
exploreView.photosphereMessage: Drag the image to explore this court yard and tap an icon to begin a tour
exploreView.popUpMessageExplore: Start this route or return to the courtyard to explore other places of interest

narrative.narrativeMessage: Tap on one of the options to select your preferred audio narrative style

primaryMenu.primaryMessage: Access different areas of this visitor guide

dailyProgramme.DailyProgrammeMessage: Discover activities and palace wonders based on your interests
dailyProgramme.dailyProgrammePopUp: Navigate back to discover other activities and palace wonders

foodDrink.foodDrinkMessage: Discover places to eat and drink around the palace
foodDrink.foodAndDrinkPopUp: Navigate back to discover other places to eat and drink around the palace

giftShop.giftShopMessage: Discover gift shops around the palace
giftShop.giftShopPopUpMessage: Navigate back to discover other gift shops around the palace

settings.SettingsMessage: Tap to select or change your language

mainDirectionsView.directionsMessage: Select your starting location and your destination to see step by step directions. Then start your tour.

journey.completed: This shows when an audio track has been completed
journey.noAudioText: This shows if there is no audio track

audioTrack.audioTrack: Hold and drag to scrub through the audio track
audioTrack.basicTrack: Please ask a warder for more information
audioTrack.completedRoute: Visit our recommended route or explore other places of interest around the palace
